extendedInfo.description: A quick, easy-to-use savings calculator for replacing household light bulbs. Great for homeowners, renters and real estate professionals. LiteFaire offers unique features for displaying whole-house savings and cost summaries as well as room-by-room calculations. Also use LiteFaire professionally to make buildings greener, encourage energy savings, improve energy efficiency, reduce utility bills, electricity use, and carbon footprint. Check out www.HomeEnergyFaire.com for free lighting, and MANY other home energy savings resources.This application will be frequently upgraded to include a greater database of mainstream residential light bulbs and lighting technologies, and will have various features implemented including a shopping list for chosen bulbs. DataFaire will also release several other energy savings applications in the near future.

reviews.comment: Excellent for determining expected energy and cost savings; very user-friendly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Put a 3 just for idea of app. I will up date my comments and rating as I use it & as this app promises to grow. Samsung Fasinate
